required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Serum Immunologic Markers Levels in During the Delivery
clinical_study.official_title: Dynamics of Serum Immunologic Markers Levels in During the Delivery and Possible Benefit for Obstetric Emergency Diagnostics

brief_summary.textblock: This study aim to describe dynamics of immunologic markers C1 inhibitor, C3, C4 during the delivery in order to improve early diagnostics of obstetric emergencies, especially with immune etiology.

detailed_description.textblock:
Our prospective observational study will explore the differences between dynamics of the complement components C1 inhibitor, C1 inhibitor activity, C3, C4 during the labour in a group of women with physiologic pregnancy and in a group with a risk of complications (pre-eclampsia, HELLP syndrome, placenta praevia, placental abruption, IUGR, previous post partum hypotony).
We will focus on women undergoing the Caesarean delivery. We will also measure D vitamin levels and ACE levels and search for some contexts.

primary_outcome.measure: Change in levels of total C1 inhibitor
primary_outcome.time_frame: 30 minutes before and 30 minutes after delivery
primary_outcome.description: Chenge in levels of total C1 inhibitor

primary_outcome.measure: Change in levels of CRP levels
primary_outcome.time_frame: 30 minutes before and 30 minutes after delivery
primary_outcome.description: Change in levels of CRP levels

primary_outcome.measure: Change in levels of D vitamin levels
primary_outcome.time_frame: 30 minutes before and 30 minutes after delivery
primary_outcome.description: Change in levels of D vitamin levels and it's relationship to pre-eclampsia

primary_outcome.measure: Change in levels of ACE levels
primary_outcome.time_frame: 30 minutes before and 30 minutes after delivery
primary_outcome.description: Change in levels of ACE levels

primary_outcome.time_frame: 30 minutes before and 30 minutes after delivery

primary_outcome.measure: Change in levels of total C3
primary_outcome.time_frame: 30 minutes before and 30 minutes after delivery
primary_outcome.description: Change in levels of total C3

primary_outcome.measure: Change in levels of total C4
primary_outcome.time_frame: 30 minutes before and 30 minutes after delivery
primary_outcome.description: Change in levels of total C4

arm_group.description: Parturients undergoing caesarean delivery with physiologic pregnancy
Parturients undergoing caesarean with risk of complications (pre-eclampsia, HELLP syndrom, placenta praevia, placental abruption, IUGR, previous post partum hypotony).

intervention.description: differences between dynamics of the complement components C1 inhibitor, C1 inhibitor activity, C3, C4 during the labour in a group of women with physiologic pregnancy and in a group with a risk of complications (pre-eclampsia, HELLP syndrome, placenta praevia, placental abruption, IUGR, previous post partum hypotony).

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Pregnant women undergoing the Caesarean delivery
- Signed informed consent
Exclusion Criteria:
- Previous hepatitis or other hepatocyte damage
